title: Top 5 States who pays highest Direct Tax in India
selftext: Maharashtra pays the highest direct tax of INR 600,000 crores. No other state even come close to it.
comments: Yes, Expected. Looks difficult for any other state to come even close to it in next decade as well. I thought, bangalore software and start-up guys must be earning good but looks all in paper money ðŸ¤ª..many start-ups later shift Office to Mumbai for financing; probably.
This will be function of corporate headquarters address. Â

Maharashtra should fight for separate nation!

/s
